name: Run 'n' Survive
description:
You are a guy stuck in a place very dangerous , so watch out.

Beware traps, some can make you lose a life another can kill you instantly.

So take a deep breath and enjoy this adventure.

Tips: 

* More less you lose lifes and collect stars , higher will be your score.

* To win, you need to open the door and touch the flag.

Thank you for play!!!

Besides, this is my 1st game! Yay!!! ;D

- Palloma
